fields.name: Copy_1_of_headerTxt1
fields.fieldText: Cooper Parry Advisory Limited Individual Risk Assessment

fields.name: natureOfAssignment
fields.fieldText: NATURE OF ASSIGNMENT

fields.name: Summarise_the_key_aspects_of_what_we_are_being_asked_to_do
fields.fieldText: Summarise the key aspects of what we are being asked to do

fields.name: feesAgreed
fields.fieldText: Fees agreed with client:

fields.name: Fees_to_be_charged
fields.fieldText: Fees to be charged

fields.name: If_reduced_fee_please_state_the_reason_why
fields.fieldText: If reduced fee – please state the reason why

fields.name: changeOfAdvisor
fields.fieldText: CHANGE OF ADVISER

fields.name: Name_of_current_advisor
fields.fieldText: Name of current adviser

fields.name: What_is_the_reason_for_the_change_Why_us
fields.fieldText: What is the reason for the change? Why us?

fields.name: coa1
fields.fieldText: Has the current adviser been advised in writing by the client that they may disclose information to us?  (Yes / No)

fields.name: If_No_please_confirm_action_to_be_taken
fields.fieldText: If No, please confirm action to be taken

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_headerTxt1
fields.fieldText: Cooper Parry Advisory Limited Individual Risk Assessment

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_generalHeader
fields.fieldText: REGULATIONS ETC.

fields.name: yesno
fields.fieldText: YES / NO / N/A

fields.name: Have_we_obtained
fields.fieldText: Have we obtained a copy of the latest tax return?

fields.name: reg11
fields.fieldText: Are there any irregularities?

fields.name: regpickyes11
fields.fieldText: If "YES" please give details below:

fields.name: fortTrusts
fields.fieldText: For trusts only:

fields.name: reg16
fields.fieldText: Confirm that we have ascertained the tax residency of all trustees.

fields.name: reg17
fields.fieldText: Do the trust or trustees have any US connection or involvement?

fields.name: regpickyes17
fields.fieldText: If “Yes” please give details below:

fields.name: reg18
fields.fieldText: Confirm that all information gathered about the trust has been assessed in the context of the FATCA requirements and any necessary action has been taken (or will be taken).

fields.name: integritytext
fields.fieldText: INTEGRITY

fields.name: yesnodisplay
fields.fieldText: YES/NO/N/A

fields.name: reg19a
fields.fieldText: Is there anything unusual or suspicious about the client or transaction

fields.name: reg19
fields.fieldText: If yes, has a report been made to the MLRO?

fields.name: regpickyes19
fields.fieldText: If not, please make additional notes below:

fields.name: int2
fields.fieldText: Have we any reason to suspect a lack of integrity?

fields.name: pickintyes2
fields.fieldText: If yes, please explain below:

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_headerTxt1
fields.fieldText: Cooper Parry Advisory Limited Individual Risk Assessment

fields.name: financialrisk
fields.fieldText: FINANCIAL RISK

fields.name: yesno2
fields.fieldText: YES / NO / N/A

fields.name: fin1
fields.fieldText: Is a liability cap to be incorporated?

fields.name: fin2
fields.fieldText: How and when will we be paid?

fields.name: fin2display
fields.fieldText: On presentation of invoice

fields.name: fin3
fields.fieldText: Are you satisfied that the client can pay as stated above?

fields.name: fin4
fields.fieldText: Is any part of the fee contingent?

fields.name: pickfinyes4
fields.fieldText: If yes, summarise the contingent arrangement below:

fields.name: mrlatitle
fields.fieldText: MONEY LAUNDERING RISK ASSESSMENT

fields.name: yesnomlra
fields.fieldText: YES/NO/N/A

fields.name: mlra16
fields.fieldText: Does the client hold assets or undertake activities overseas?

fields.name: mlra17
fields.fieldText: Does the client have links with individuals or businesses in overseas countries with weak money laundering regimes?

fields.name: mrla18
fields.fieldText: Does the client use products, services or entities which provide anonymity?

fields.name: mlra19
fields.fieldText: Have we established the client’s source wealth? Please give details below.

fields.name: mlra20
fields.fieldText: Have we established the client’s source of the client’s funds? Please give details below .

fields.name: mlra7
fields.fieldText: Do we anticipate holding monies for the client?

fields.name: hrdisplay
fields.fieldText: A “Yes” answer to ANY of the above means the client must be treated as high risk

fields.name: havewemet
fields.fieldText: Have we met the client face to face?

fields.name: IfNo
fields.fieldText: If “No” the client must be treated as high risk

fields.name: cppolicy
fields.fieldText: Updated CP policy - ALL clients have to be met either in person or via a Teams meeting so that photo ID and person can be matched and verified:

fields.name: mlra9
fields.fieldText: Please state which team member has met the client.

fields.name: mlra10
fields.fieldText: Please give details of individuals we have met, for example a trustee or POA if not the person we are onboarding.

fields.name: mlra11
fields.fieldText: Other comments:

fields.name: mlra12
fields.fieldText: Is the client a Politically Exposed Person (PEP)?

fields.name: FamilyMembers
fields.fieldText: Are any family members or close associates of the client PEPs?

fields.name: mlrawarning
fields.fieldText:
A “Yes” answer to either of the above means the client must be treated as high risk and Enhanced Due Diligence (EDD) procedures as set out in the firm’s Client Acceptance Guidance Notes (available on the intranet) applied. 

Record EDD procedures undertaken below:

fields.name: mlra15
fields.fieldText: Considering the above factors, the risk of money laundering is:

screens.name: Page_4_IDENTITY_VERIFICATION
screens.label: Page 4 - IDENTITY VERIFICATION, OTHER RISKS, OBJECTIVITY

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_headerTxt1
fields.fieldText: Cooper Parry Advisory Limited Individual Risk Assessment

fields.name: identityverif
fields.fieldText: Identity verification

fields.name: identityverif2
fields.fieldText:
SmartSearch check (“High” risk setting); AND One government issued document with photo e.g., passport or driving licence AND document detailing address e.g., utility bill.

 

Beneficial Owner (if a partnership ensure all Beneficial owners are identified) (for trusts, ensure this includes all Settlors, Trustees, Beneficiaries and Protectors)

fields.name: Full_Name
fields.fieldText: Full Name

fields.name: Full_Name2
fields.fieldText: Full Name

fields.name: Full_Name3
fields.fieldText: Full Name

fields.name: Full_Name4
fields.fieldText: Full Name

fields.name: idcomments
fields.fieldText:
Identification comments: For Personal Tax clients please include certified ID and a SmartSearch on High. Please upload documents to SharePoint.


Please provide any further info in the space provided below.

fields.name: iv2
fields.fieldText: Does photo ID match the individual met?

fields.name: ordisp
fields.fieldText: OTHER RISKS

fields.name: yn
fields.fieldText: YES/NO/N/A

fields.name: or1
fields.fieldText: Is there public interest in the client?

fields.name: orpick1yes
fields.fieldText: If yes, please detail below why you are happy to proceed:

fields.name: or2
fields.fieldText: Are we being invited to act for only part of a relationship/group?

fields.name: or3
fields.fieldText: Can we demonstrate our competence to perform the proposed work?

fields.name: or4
fields.fieldText: Has the client stated any specific requirements e.g., certain CP people, timing?

fields.name: OBJdisp
fields.fieldText: OBJECTIVITY/CONFLICTS OF INTEREST ETC

fields.name: ynobj
fields.fieldText: YES/NO/N/A

fields.name: obj1
fields.fieldText: Do we already act for any parties involved or have we acted in the past?

fields.name: obj1a
fields.fieldText:
Has any CP team member a family relationship or other close involvement

with any party ?

fields.name: obj3
fields.fieldText: Are there any other relationships or other issues which may threaten our objectivity or could be perceived to do so?

fields.name: obj4
fields.fieldText: Are we involved in any dispute with any party?

fields.name: obj5
fields.fieldText: Have potential conflicts been identified for any other reason?

fields.name: obj7
fields.fieldText: Considering all the above, have we identified significant personal or professional relationships or conflicts of interest which could threaten our objectivity or be seen to do so?

fields.name: objpickyes7
fields.fieldText: If yes, please summarise below.

fields.name: obj8
fields.fieldText: Can safeguards be implemented which will reduce the threat(s) to an acceptable level?

fields.name: objpickyes8
fields.fieldText: If yes, please describe below.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_headerTxt1
